Package com.halloween.controller

Class StoreGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.halloween.controller.StoreGame
  • public class StoreGame
extends Object
    This class is responsible for saving the current game data and loading previously saved game data.

    • Method Detail

      • loadGame

        public <T> T loadGame​(String resourceFile,
                      Type type,
                      com.google.gson.Gson gson)
        Loads previously saved game data from a JSON file and returns .
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the data/model class.
        Parameters:
        resourceFile - Name of the resource file to read in.
        type - The type of the model class that matches the data to be read.
        gson - An instance of Gson used to convert JSON data to Java object and vice versa.
        Returns:
        Returns either an instance of model class if the load was successful. Otherwise, returns null.

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame​(State state,
                     Player player,
                     Neighborhood neighborhood)
        Saves the complete current game data into three separate JSON files.
        Parameters:
        state - The state of the current game (e.g., terminal or still-playing).
        player - The player's data (e.g., player's name).
        neighborhood - The neighborhood data (locations in the game).

      • removeJsonFiles

        public void removeJsonFiles()
        Removes three JSON files that comprise a complete game data.
